channel.title: Stop Pming me to ask if i want to be your coder
channel.description:
Ok im getting mad now, i like to help people but this is going too far omg. Stop Pming me to ask if i want to be a coder of your server! Each day getting 25 Pms with people are asking if i can be a coder of their server. Examples:
[quote="ki11er"]hey god of ikiliki,
I was wondering if you could help me code my server, please consider this as i will need this, i can make you admin, give u 3 player rights on my server, i might need help on website with the design and please i need help[/quote] [quote="bartiscool22"]Code my server please, you are friendly and a good coder, i will give you admin if you want[/quote] [quote="jua"]Ey m8 code my server plzz You will get rights 3 and get credits Plz man ur the best
Thx, Jua[/quote]
Ok getting mad about these things, Also stop Mailing me about these things. Currently someone is spamming my mailbox full cause i denied his question. Now he is spamming ''f*ck'' to my mail. So please do not ask this on Pming/Mailing/Msn.
Just post it in the help section or something if you want to help

item.title: Stop Pming me to ask if i want to be your coder
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Kami Kazi, post:10, topic:34922”][quote author=green dude link=topic=50136.msg615571#msg615571 date=1166043276]
Anyone know why the ppl can’t rep++ anymore?
[/quote]

ikiliki prolly broke it… lol people were giving him rep for nothing except to get him to 50 karma.[/quote]
Lol nope,
If you look at my rep it says Nice Tut, Thanks for helping me, Nice server etc.
Just when i had 49 rep 0o Java gave me one again so i got 50 lol.

green dude:

Anyone know why the ppl can’t rep++ anymore?

Toke out i think

Read full topic

item.title: Stop Pming me to ask if i want to be your coder
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Ok im getting mad now, i like to help people but this is going too far omg.
Stop Pming me to ask if i want to be a coder of your server!
Each day getting 25 Pms with people are asking if i can be a coder of their server.
Examples:

[quote=“ki11er”]hey god of ikiliki,

I was wondering if you could help me code my server, please consider this as i will need this, i can make you admin, give u 3 player rights on my server, i might need help on website with the design and please i need help[/quote]

bartiscool22:

Code my server please, you are friendly and a good coder, i will give you admin if you want

[quote=“jua”]Ey m8 code my server plzz
You will get rights 3 and get credits
Plz man ur the best

Thx,
Jua[/quote]

Ok getting mad about these things,
Also stop Mailing me about these things.
Currently someone is spamming my mailbox full cause i denied his question.
Now he is spamming ‘‘f*ck’’ to my mail.
So please do not ask this on Pming/Mailing/Msn.

Just post it in the help section or something if you want to help
